name: Scala-skunkworks
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### What is Scala?
These notes assume that the basic of programming are known are hence fast paced, it has the code linked to the same repository all the codes from basics are written in full.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
In 2012, Vidyasagar N (@vidyasagar1729)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? contact me at vidyasagar1729@gmail.com and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
